name: Format\LinkAddition
description: The addition object for defining links in text components that don’t use HTML or Markdown formatting.

properties.name: rangeLength
properties.description: The number of text characters to highlight as the link.

properties.name: rangeStart
properties.description:
The starting character index for which the link addition is meant. A range starts at  for the first character.
If rangeStart is specified, rangeLength is required.

properties.name: type
properties.description: The type of addition. Use link.

properties.name: URL
properties.description: The URL to open when a user interacts with the range of text specified in the addition.
